back-to-back 3-pointers that gave the Pistons the lead for good and sent them to a 107-102 victory over the Golden State Warriors on Thursday night. "That really hurt my feelings, that tip," Rasheed Wallace said. You can't let that frustrate you. I missed two point-blank foul shots. I'm upset at myself about that. You can't let that one thing get you down. That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Richard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . "When people criticize Larry Page as the new CEO, that's grossly unfair to Larry Page ," Eric Schmidt told reporters, according to the Journal. He has been with me at every business decision for 10 years. Eric Schmidt also dismissed the notion that competition with Facebook is driving Google and was a factor in the management shift. He instead pointed to Microsoft as a major competitor, according to Schmidt-on-google-facebook-and-apple/"> Fortune.

conventional minivan with sliding doors- likely a Dodge- as well as a Chrysler luxury crossover. A full-size front-wheel or all-wheel-drive sedan and even some Fiat brand vehicles also could be part of that family. The architecture would be a lot more capable and allow us to make a minivan-like vehicle as well as others, Sergio Marchionne said. The family would be part of a larger goal of getting 80 percent of its vehicles from four or five architectures, a path he said Chrysler is just starting now. "
